content: In the Guest's Parlor, the CP0 agents were contacted by Rob Lucci, where Guernica informed the others of the second dragon fighting for the alliance, which was most likely Vegapunk's failed Artificial Devil Fruit. However, the off-island agents were not concerned about this, and instead told the Onigashima agents of their orders. By command from those above, a fleet was sent to annex the island as territory of the World Government in the event of Kaidou's defeat, though both agents expressed their disbelief for such a thing to happen. Lucci then gave orders to the on-island agents, stating that no matter which side won, Nico Robin was to be captured, to which the agents quickly complied.
